Class MultUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.MultUnit

  • public class MultUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    the MUL/DIV class. A processing unit for floating point multiplication and division.
    Author:
    David

      • execute

        public void execute(int stationNumber)
        Doing the actual calculation (what happens once a command enters a unit from the station) and writing to CDB
        Parameters:
        stationNumber - the line in the reservation station table that holds the to be executed instruction

      • setBusy

      • acceptIntoStation

        public static boolean acceptIntoStation(Instruction inst,
                                        int thread)
        attempt to accept new command into the reservation station, it there is room it succeeds
        Parameters:
        inst - the instruction we want to our station
        thread - the thread the instruction belongs to
        Returns:
        True if successful, else false

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        is this station busy this CC?
        Returns:
        true if station is working, else false
